website_summaries.verdict: Has a lot of convenient features for a mid-range price, but similar models offer better quality.
pros: Has a push-button lid and easy-to-handle shape
We love its meter for monitoring intake
cons: Our testers noted that the lid has the tendency to leak, and has a flimsy feel

customer_reviews.title: Very good bottle. Could use two improvements.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this water bottle. Pros: - easy to hold on to - meter numbers tell you how much you've been drinking - sturdy and leak-proof - one-handed opening (great for in the truck) - top design keeps the drinking spout clean - carrying loop is sturdy Cons: - the oblong design of the bottom is a fraction of an inch too big to fit in our chair cup holders - the lid likes to cross-thread when you put it on Even with the two issues, I'd buy this water bottle again if I need a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: crane1111

customer_reviews.title: I've ordered four (4) in the last 12 months - not again
customer_reviews.text: I travel with this all the time, and maybe it's me, but I don't use the metal clip to keep it closed. My bad! If you drop it, the plastic piece that keeps the lid closed will surely break. Though this water bottle was great while it lasted, which was roughly 6 months each, it is easy to clean and the design is great, with hook to use as a handle. If you are gentle on water bottles, and never knock them over...order one. If not, look for something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Handy@Home

customer_reviews.title: Water doesn’t leak
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle and water doesn’t leak impressive design. Easy to use easy to open easy to clean. The big water mouth is very friendly and easy to bring phone. Crate bottle and water doesn’t leak impressive design. Easy to use easy to open easy to clean. The big water mouth is very friendly and easy to Drink from. The only thing is that the base is a little smaller so been standing upright it’s easy to knock it over. Make sure you don’t make the same mistake after you drink from it close the Van sitting on the table this way you won’t spill the liquid all over your keyboard!!
customer_reviews.author: bAnsIonCal

customer_reviews.title: Meh.... underwhelmed - even with tons of ice, water got warm quickly
customer_reviews.text: I assumed since it was made from Thermos that it would keep my water colder much longer than it did.... I guess I shouldn't have assumed! I loaded it up to the top with ice, filled with cold water and within a couple of hours all of the ice had melted and the water was getting warm. This was in a cool environment, too. On a positive note, I do like the top for keeping germs out and having the ability to securely close it without worrying about it leaking in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: great as a monitor for consumption. it was a gift and the receiver said it sweats so leakproof lost stars. seal holds but condensation caused puddles. plus the ice cold water he filled it with was room temp in 2 hours. every refill. granted this was inexpensive but why buy a thermos if it can't hold the temp? i own a metal tumbler that keeps ice overnight. maybe should have sent him one of those.
customer_reviews.author: htc

customer_reviews.title: Totally solid plastic water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Got it because the Wirecutter recommendation. Hits everything I wanted from a water bottle. It fits a good amount of water and has a little notch slider ring to count how many bottles you've had that day. Good if you find yourself not consuming enough water in a day. The lid is rather nice. It has a rubber part to seal the tube you drink from so it will not leak in a bag. There is a little metal hook thing that is used to lock the lid in better to make sure it does not leak. It also has a hook thing for a carabiner if you are one of those people who uses carabiners.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle, but fragile.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three of these bottles. Initially I purchased two, one for my wife and one for me. After my first one broke from dropping it from waist height, I bought another one. This third one recently broke when it rolled off my sofa. They both broke at the latch mechanism, rendering the bottle unable to close. I will not be purchasing another bottle like this.
customer_reviews.author: HiggyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Buying again, they last!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the purple and blue ones since about 2008. Easy to clean: top rack dishwasher. I've dropped an old one of mine which caused a fracture in the lid, but it still seals and locks. I can't access drinking water at work, so I bought a third one to stay hydrated in the heat. These aren't insulated. I keep mine in a lunchpail with an ice pack.
customer_reviews.author: bremphi9

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a replacement for one from 10 or so years ago. The prior one had been dropped a few times and survived, but this last time a piece broke off that kept the lid shut. We figured that it was well worth the money for how long it lasted and truly being used almost everyday of those many years. The only thing different is I ordered a different color. Easy grip, easy open, easy to drink from.
customer_reviews.author: TJB016

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I used a similar bottle like this for years until the cover finally snapped off. I was apprehensive buying this one because it is a different brand, but it turned out to be great! The purple is very dark (see picture) but it is a good size and perfect for carrying water around. I have (unfortunately) already dropped it several times and it has not broken or popped open once! The only weird thing about it is that the metal safety latch just slides over the plastic part, so it doesn't seem super secure, but it has still never come undone for me so it works fine anyways!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: The lid doesn't stay open
customer_reviews.text: I did not know this when buying the product, but the lid does not flip open nor stay open when you unlatch it. If you push the lid back and then begin to drink, i.e. tilt the bottle as there is no straw, the lid will naturally fall forward and bonk you in the face. You have to constantly, purposefully hold the lid open as you drink. It is so annoying that I do not use the water bottle. Thermos has a bottle with a lid that automatically stays open and I recommend this other one:
customer_reviews.author: FREDRICK WADE CHERRY

customer_reviews.title: Good size, SUPER easy to clean & use!
customer_reviews.text: I already had one of these, which I'd purchased elsewhere; and loved it! So saw this one here & had been needing a backup..so I got it. I love it, use it all of the time! It's Good size, SUPER easy to clean & use! No downside to this product, except that you must keep it in cold environment to maintain cold temperature of your beverage. But for me, I use it for my shakes, so I'm done with it pretty quick. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: travelgirl

customer_reviews.title: These bottles are great! They are solid congruction and seals around the ...
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are great! They are solid congruction and seals around the edge and on the lid keep them from spilling. One of my favorite parts is the little metal ring that locks the lid down. The lid lock down without it, but that metal ring ensures of you drop the bottle the lid will stay on so nothing spills and you don't get any dirt around the spout you drink out of. My husband is hard on things and hes had one of these bottle for over a year now. The button that pops the lid open has broken, but it's still useable because that metal ring can still hold it closed.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy cleaning water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Greatest water bottle ever. This is my second one. It's super easy to drink from and clean. It has a removable silicon gasket for a good seal and easy cleaning. The flip lid protecting the drink spout is very durable and easy to use. The heavy duty body keeps things reasonably cool on long walks, or by the pool while I am swimming. I have never used it for hot drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open and close.
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for an old one I had. The top on the old one cracked when I dropped the bottle. You can order just the top for $2.50 directly from the company. However, I have not done so yet because I can still close the top using the metal piece. But, I loved the last one so much I searched for the exact one. I like how it opens and closes. It has never leaked. I know that the more environmentally-friendly thing to have done was to buy a stainless steel bottle, but I don't like how the water tastes in them.
customer_reviews.author: Debra M.

customer_reviews.title: com/gp/product/B00DPLUCS6/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_1 and I just love them! I had some cheap $1 bottles that ...
customer_reviews.text: I got both the purple and  and I just love them! I had some cheap $1 bottles that I was using and after a while just started to smell/warp etc. It was time I got replacements for them. These are pretty sturdy and dishwasher safe. Though, I hand wash the lids. (Bad experiences with rubber seals and dishwashers in the past so now I don't take the chance.) I found these same bottles at Target for $9.99 and ended up buying more from there since It's a couple dollars cheaper, and no shipping cost/waiting. But even still well worth the price/wait!
customer_reviews.author: Dark Elf

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean but lid broke
customer_reviews.text: I always look for a bottle thats easy to clean and doesnt leak so in that regard, this fits the bill. However, the lid broke for one of the bottles I purchased so it made one of them completely un-useable which was a waste. It might be good for adults that are gentle with their things. This just did not work out in terms of durability for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: 808bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Spill proof
customer_reviews.text: We have used these Thermos bottles for years. No need to waste money or needlessly hurt the environment buying bottled water. With the metal lock in place, these are absolutely spill proof, even when dropped. They are comfortable in hand and fit our car's cup holder. The only gripe is that the top is fragile. It does not take much of a jolt for the locking mechanism to break, rendering the bottle uncloseable.
customer_reviews.author: HobbesEsq

customer_reviews.title: Good water bottle, great design
customer_reviews.text: Both hubs and I have these water bottles. We really like the small handles (good for hooks or just picking it up with one finger, if necessary), the one-hand operation is great, and it's pretty durable. We put ours in the dishwasher, though I can't recall if you're supposed to or not. Because it has a "spout" under the cap, I can drink it while driving and not get water all over my face.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: I like that it has a clip to keep the bottle ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle of this style. I like that it has a clip to keep the bottle closed and has a counter on the ring around the top so you can keep track of how many you've had to drink. It's a sturdy bottle that I recommend and have purchased for others. I did have some problems with my older one that the clear "plug" in the lid would come out easily. That made it easy to lose as well. With this most recent bottle the plug fits much more tightly so I haven't had the same issue. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed closing hook.  Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend this water bottle. The closing hook is poorly designed and it cracks easily. Once the hook is broken, the only way to use the bottle by using locking metal hoop. That's a lot more difficult to open.
customer_reviews.author: Will0711

customer_reviews.title: All time favorite
customer_reviews.text: I've had about 3 of these bottles now. The first one (years ago) broke when I dropped it. The second one just got really scratched up (and then broke right after I ordered this one because I dropped it again). They are great. If you drop them full of water + open, they will break. But just be careful and you've got a great bottle for years.
customer_reviews.author: JKarki

customer_reviews.title: The perfect water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I carry this bottle around with me everywhere I go. It goes in my purse, it goes on my bike, it goes in my car cupholders – it fits everywhere perfectly. It never leaks. I have gone through at least three or four of these. They only break when dropped just right on the lid and I immediately go on Amazon and order another one because they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: E. Random

customer_reviews.title: Defective, flimsy and can't return it
customer_reviews.text: The design is cute and it seems easy enough to clean. It came with the intake counter broken. The parts are flimsy and it won't hold up long with regular use. I tried to return and it is ineligible so I'm stuck with this crappy bottle that is defective. My husband got the Pogo bottle, he's happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: infivefour

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well But Stopper on Lid Fell Off
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for the first few months. But rubber stopper on lid and mouth piece fell off so container is no longer leak proof. Cannot safely keep lid closed and keep on a bag without having water spill everywhere. No gnarly plastic taste though!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is very durable, I have dropped it many many times. The top is very secure since it snaps on and locks. The only thing I do'n't like is that when screwing on the cap if you have water in the threads it will drip for a little bit until that water in the threads gets out. That is by no means a deal breaker though since the water bottle itself is not leaking, I love this water bottle and still highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Karls

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an Aladdin water bottle that I've had for at least 10 years. This one is a great replacement. The flip top is wonderful...it locks, it releases easily, and it is held in place when open so it doesn't pop you in the nose while you're drinking. I'm really liking this bottle and looking forward to the next 10 years with it ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Love the flip top style
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new water bottle. We really like the flip tops and the fact it doesn’t have a straw to get filthy. The opening is wide enough to make it easy to clean. He doesn’t really use the dial to keep track of his intake. The shape of the bottle also makes it easy to grip when you are working out
customer_reviews.author: Sam I Am

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bottle (but don't drop it)
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy, easy-to-use, inexpensive water bottle. The only problem is that the clear plastic cover breaks quite easily. I've bought three of these and with two of them, the first time they rolled off a table, the clips holding the clear plastic cover to the bottom of the cover broke, making the bottle unusable (because without the clips, it leaks too easily).
customer_reviews.author: brucemn

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite water bottles
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite water bottles... been using them for years. I have tried others but I always come back to this one. There is only one flaw, which is over time, if you drop it, the tab that holds the lid down will break. There are two solutions: 1. You can keep using the lid but latch it down with the metal loop 2. Order lid replacements from Thermos I order four replacement lids at a time to keep for when they break. That is now much I like these bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Carey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I started a new detox type diet and going from drinking maybe 16 oz of water to almost a gallon a day...this helps me keep track i simply slide the number tracker over to keep count. I've had it a month now. Easy to carry with the black plastic loop for when I'm carrying my gym bag, purse and anything else! Leakproof, ergonomical, colorful. My 2 year old granddaughter always wants to drink from it when she sees it. Ordering another as a spare.
customer_reviews.author: runningdogmom

customer_reviews.title: This water bottle would be the perfect bottle except
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle would be the perfect bottle except the lid does not seal on the outside and allows dust, sand, etc. to get onto the drinking spout area. This is unfortunate that I was creating necklaces with kids on Arbor day using cedar rounds that had a little sawdust. Mybottle was just sitting on the table and it really allowed a lot of dust to get onto the spout area. Not into the spout, so wiping off and it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle! I have already reviewed the other ones I purchased. I'm going to review this one as well because I want everybody to know how wonderful the product is for me. I purchased some bottles that look similar to this at the store. The mouthpiece was harsh to drink out of and this one is not. Additionally, it does not leak!!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Love the water bottle, don't like the triangle bottom
customer_reviews.text: The water bottle works well and has held up well to daily use. The reason for 4 stars is I don't like the triangular bottom. It fits into cup holders just find but being triangular makes it less sturdy when sitting it on flat surfaces vs had they just made it round.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bottle
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased a what seems to be an older edition of this bottle at Smith's and after about a year the little rubber band that prevents the lid from falling on you face while drinking broke. I have purchased this bottle for my husband before and the new edition has an improved design for securing the lid. I use the bottle every day. The material feels of good quality, quite thick plastic and the design and color is so pretty. No issues with this bottle and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Neal

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle, latch breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle. That's why I have just bought my 3rd and 4th copy. The clear top latch breaks, and the only way to latch it is with the wire safety catch. Otherwise, it's a wonderful bottle. I'll keep buying them about every 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: The best water bottle design of them all
customer_reviews.text: I've used this style of bottle for over 5 years now, it's choice. Simple to use one handed, easy to clean, doesn't leak, and is pleasant to gulp from. The only downsides are that dropping it on the top tends to break the lid catch making it useless, and the silicone seal will stain over time if not ran through the dishwasher regularly.
customer_reviews.author: aerich

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof, can throw in a bag
customer_reviews.text: Only water bottle that doesn’t leak when I throw it in my backpack. I buy these over and over again. Only complaint is that if you drop it, they will break the lid. However, the fact that it’s so leak proof makes me buy more. Just be careful not to drop
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Your search is over!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best water bottles I've owned. Absolutely no leaks! This has always been a problem with every other water bottle ever. Not only leak-proof, but the lid also pops open at a touch of a button, which can be locked. It's easy to open/close/lock/unlock it with only one hand, cause life is constantly putting us in those situations. It also has a counter on the side so you can tally up your water consumption. Love how it feels in your hand as well, very satisfied with this purchase. Thank you for this great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Lid latch fails after a short time
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, one for each kid, six weeks later both lids are broken. They no longer latch. They have no visible cracks, the latch mechanism just fails to latch. Too late to return on Amazon, this is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: stelvis

customer_reviews.title: Best water bottle ever
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these water bottles. They never leak, hold a lot of water, have a hook to hang them on a belt or backpack and are durable. I got this one as an extra because I like having more than one available. I have had two others for a long time. They seem a little pricey at first, but they are well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Snickerfritz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Holds up well over time
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bottle for over a year and a half now, and it has served me well. It's easy to drink from, the loop that allows room for a clip is very helpful, and it has held up well over time. The only minor issue I've had in this time was the metal latch falling out once (which keeps the lid "locked") but I was easily able to put this piece back in place, not having any trouble with it since. I often get compliments on it/ the color, as well as get asked about where it was purchased.
customer_reviews.author: LoMic

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: Apparently I have bought four of these, and they have all died relatively quickly. Part of it is clumsiness on my part (20' drop onto stone...though I have had other water bottle survive this), but there is a small clip on the lid that is very easy to break. Yesterday I broke the clip when I accidental knocked the bottle off an 15" table onto a wood floor. It is a nice bottle until you drop it, then the cap doesn't work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: John McClain

customer_reviews.title: Fun to drink
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after the review in WireCutter, for hiking, urban trekking, festivals, & building stuff outdoors. It is a great bottle. The large spout is super nice to use, and makes drinking much more enjoyable. The whole mechanism is simple & robust. Easy to clean as well. If hanging it around while hiking/moving, remember to lock! If the top is opened by mistake, spills are quick & huge. The top seals the spout but not the area around it. So (like all other bottles) it's not 100% immune to dusty/underwater environments. Overall, a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: T. S.

customer_reviews.title: There’s better....
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Bought based on reviews, but the lid does not pop open all the way on button push so a two handed function then lid hits you in the face (my glasses) while drinking. Honestly this thing ticks me off when it hits me in the face.
customer_reviews.author: Shark Likes

customer_reviews.title: Really like it. Fits my purpose
customer_reviews.text: I really like the bottle. I is light, holds water properly and easy to clean. Some people say it sweats for cold water; it agree it does but it doesnot bother me as i drink water every five minutes so i dont even notice the sweat. For someone who want light bottle to drink cold water, this is a nice bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ujjwal Acharya

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle but the latch is easy to break
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this water bottle. I've owned two of them and I managed to break the plastic latch on both of them. Luckily they included a secondary metal lock that I've been forced to use as the primary latch after breaking the plastic. It's serviceable but not ideal. I really wish I could buy replacement lids for these but even with the broken latch I still love this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Keller

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: This design is my absolute favorite water bottle. You open the cap with one push of your finger and the covered spout never comes in contact with the germs on your hand. These are very sturdy. The silicone gasket prevents leaks, and comes out easily for cleaning. There's no stupid straw to try to clean. The metal clip prevents accidental spills. I own several and take them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: LaPorteLS

customer_reviews.title: I love the rotating wheel that helps keep track of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a water bottle that will not leak and I have finally found it! I try to drink lots of water every day and sometimes its a little difficult for me to keep track and make sure I'm achieving my water goals. With this water bottle that's not a problem! I love the rotating wheel that helps keep track of my water consumption. The only complaint I have about this water bottle is that it doesn't keep my water cool for long. I usually cannot take it to my hot yoga sessions because the water will be extremely hot after after about 30 minutes. All in all a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Vocal Yogurt

customer_reviews.title: I THOUGHT I BETTER PURCHASE ANOTHER BECAUSE I CAN'T BE WITHOUT
customer_reviews.text: LONG, LONG AGO I FIRST FOUND THIS AND PURCHASED THE THERMOS WATER BOTTLE AT WALMART. THIS WATER BOTTLE GOES EVERYWHERE WITH ME BECAUSE I DON'T HAVE SALIVA. I THOUGHT I BETTER PURCHASE ANOTHER BECAUSE I CAN'T BE WITHOUT. I BOUGHT 3 AND SO FAR THEY SIT-UNUSED. EVEN WITH DROPPING THEM AND CONSTANT USE THIS ONE HAS LASTED SEVERAL YEARS. THANK YOU PEOPLE WHO MAKES THESE!!!
customer_reviews.author: MommaJ

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and good seal!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a while now and really like it. I carry water everywhere and appreciate the lightweight plastic that this is made of. I like glass but it is too heavy and the metal ones are never that watertight. I carry this inside my backpack and never worry that things will get wet. Good seal!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Smith

customer_reviews.title: Work well for me
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this water bottle because it has a real opening and is not a sippy type. Very easy to keep clean. Fits in my car cup holders. It does have one problem - It is hard plastic and, if you drop your water bottle, the tab that clicks into place when the lid goes down has a tendency to break. Despite this, I still purchase this item. I carry too much "stuff" in my hands while trying to open car door!
customer_reviews.author: Judy in CA

customer_reviews.title: 3 so far, work great.
customer_reviews.text: We only use these type bottles with filtered water, mostly when we go to bed so if knocked over, no mess. I have bought 3, so far, to replace older bottles that the flip tops are wearing out and leaking when stored stacked in the fridge in a wine bottle storage unit. They are ran through the dishwasher after every use and have held up beautifully. There is a ring around the top you can use to count the number of bottles you drink per day, but we don't use them. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this bottle style for over a decade, and am glad they've kept it pretty much the same - they fit my hand just right, don't leak except by user error, and hold up incredibly well. The only caveat is, you HAVE to flip the little metal lock thing up if you're doing anything where the bottle could fall hard. If you do that, it'll be fine. If not, the little plastic bit that catches to close it has a tendency to break.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney G

customer_reviews.title: Congratulations. You have found it.
customer_reviews.text: For too long, my thirst for the perfect water bottle had gone unquenched. That was until I encountered the Thermos Nissan Intak Hydration Water Bottle WITH Meter, in blue. A wide spout from which the h20 can flow without restriction! A delightful clear cap, which pops open at the touch of a button, capable of closing and sealing to be sure you don't lose a drop! A robust and enchanting slender blue bottle of 24 ounce proportions, ribbed for your pleasure! WHAT'S NOT TO LOVE?! For me, and most certainly for you, this is the epitome of a most ideal transportable hydration system.
customer_reviews.author: walterman

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle so much. First, it's easy to clean since the mouth is a spout. Second, it's leakproof and I don't have to worry about pressure changes during flights (unlike the camelbaks with the mouthpiece). Third, it's high quality and durable. This is truly the perfect water bottle
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Liu

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and leak proof
customer_reviews.text: not sure what warmth means? have used this particular bottle for years. doesn't leak has an extra clasp to keep lid from popping open. Can be a little top heavy when empty but these bottles have bounced off the floor more times than I can count and do not break.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Travel Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who was jealous of my bottle which I had received as a gift. It is a wonderful bottle to take on trips and re-fill at rest areas, or in my situation take to work everyday and refill at the water cooler. The only fault I find with this bottle is the a amount of condensation when you put ice in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle with a crippling weakness rendering it too fragile to recommend
customer_reviews.text: There's a crippling aspect to this bottle's design - the cheap, tiny little plastic clip which holds the lid in place. It breaks, way too easily. All it took was a single drop onto a carpeted floor from a few feet up and that cheap crappy plastic lip broke off, was impossible to repair securely, and afterward it would no longer stay closed unless you used the metal clip locking mechanism (which itself isn't that reliable and is kind of a paid to use). Such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a water bottle that would help me track my water consumption. This did not do the trick. The dial is clunky and non user friendly. Also, water does not stay cold. On the plus side, I like the drinking spout and the fact that the opening is big enough to add ice to your water.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle & nice shade of purple
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this bottle! I was looking for something that would hold a lot of water without being too bulky or leaking, and this has been perfect. The texture on the side makes it easy to grip, even if there is some condensation on the outside. The lid seals tightly, and it hasn't leaked while carrying it around in my hands or bag.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to drink from
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bottle just for the lid. I love that it has a large opening to get ice cubes in and it is easy to drink from. It also has a dual locking feature that come in handy if you are using it around electronics. Great water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D. Corre

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Neat design, looks nice. Leaks like crazy. The top does not seal good, so I ended up having it dribble down the front of my shirt. I took the top off and tried again, same results. If that's important to you, stay well away. Edit - I couldn't believe that this top leaked so easily, so I did some research. Turns out the gasket inside the top was folded over, causing it not to get a good seal. I fixed that and now it works fine. I'm still not crazy about it as I would think that should not happen on a good product. However, this one was not expensive, so no worries. I probably would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Exciting at first but I hate this bottle now.
customer_reviews.text: I loved my water bottle at first but after dropping it a few times the plastic tab broke off so it wouldn't click closed and I am constantly cleaning mold out from under the rubber stopper sealing the spout. I'm constantly losing the metal ring that locks the top and after maybe 6 months water started leaking because the rubber seal wore out. I'd recommend you look elsewhere if you want a durable water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle! Easy to clean, one-hand opening, carry loop, big spout. Unfortunately, have had to re-order it several times as the cap, while sturdy, doesn't stand up to being dropped by someone like me who is accident-prone.
customer_reviews.author: Asmith

customer_reviews.title: Okay If You Treat It Nice...
customer_reviews.text: It's great - if you take good care of your things. I am always on the move and a bit of a klutz, so it didn't last long for me... The metal closing-piece on the first bottle I ordered fell off a few days after I received it. Amazon sent me a replacement in no time. I've been using that bottle for the past 2 months, but, alas, it bit the dust as well this week. Again - the metal piece fell off. The bottle still snaps shut, but I don't trust it to be secure enough for my bag. Time to try a different one!
customer_reviews.author: SaraD

customer_reviews.title: Use it everyday!
customer_reviews.text: Use this water bottle everyday! Perfect for people who are germophobes like me :D I love how the top covers the mouthpiece and it's so easy to open with the click of a button. I also like that there's a metal piece to secure the open/close button. I've had so many instances with other bottles where the water would leak because the lid wasn't secured, but I've never had a problem with this bottle. It's pretty stylish too! For the price, this bottle is more than worth it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S.A

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these water bottles before and love them. They are big which is great as not constantly refilling. The color options are great here too. They are cheaper elsewhere but you don’t have the color options. Would recommend and buy again. Also easy to handwash with only a few pieces.
customer_reviews.author: xviiiscore

customer_reviews.title: We bought 4!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and so worth the money. I especially appreciate the lid which closes off the mouthpiece from the elements (and whatever else is around your water bottle... on the farm, that could be a myriad of things!) My daughter especially likes the meter as it's a simple and unobstructive way to keep track of your water intake. My hubby appreciates the locking lid... he's not getting knocked in the nose with the flips he's used to. I'm hoping the hook for a carabiner clip will last, as well as the body itself. Time will tell. In the meantime, excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: noreaster2

customer_reviews.title: Great Flow
customer_reviews.text: I ready like to flow adjustments. When I am working out and really hitting hard, I need the flow of water to be much slower than usual. Most other products do not have that adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK GOMEZ

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle. I love how secure it is when it is closed. The cheapie bottles always leak. I bought three: one for me and one each for my two boys. The silver lock thing fell off of my 7-year-old's bottle (probably because he mini-manhandles everything), but that doesn't seem to matter. The lock is just extra protection, but the thing doesn't leak without the lock anyway. I think I'm drinking more water with this bottle as the solid mouthpiece allows me to drink heartily, if that makes sense. And it is super easy to clean (more so that the pull top or straw type bottles).
customer_reviews.author: Quilla

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Can't live without it. This is like my 3rd one. The only part that breaks, after several years, is the snap to close the lid. Can still use it with the metal loop, but you don't get that cool snap sound. Work, travel, running errands, this thing goes everywhere. Very durable, easy to clean, leak proof and holds a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Ray

customer_reviews.title: Such a beautiful water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful water bottle. I agree that the counter is annoying. The lowest it goes is 1, so if you're actually trying to keep track you can't reset it to 0, and then it only goes up to 6. It's one of my favorite water bottles, but that's just such a poorly designed feature I wish it wasn't there at all. Fits in cup holders, doesn't leak, easy to drink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like the top of this bottle
customer_reviews.text: I really like the top of this bottle. It keeps you from having to suck on it like a baby sucks on a bottle. I also like the shape and size. Fits perfectly in a cup holder in the pickup. The thing I hate is it's not insulated so it won't keep anything cold and it sweats like crazy. Thermos is synonymous with insulated containers and to have this be simply made of plastic is not what I expected at all. For the high price, there are a lot of better "thermoses" out there that are insulated. You can purchase one for less than $6 filled with ice coffee at your local Dunkin Donuts that puts this to shame.
customer_reviews.author: TheBigOldDog

customer_reviews.title: Solid Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle checks all the boxes: lightweight, easy to grip, easy to drink from, and easier to clean than other bottles I've had in the past. Apparently the top contains a wring you can turn in order to count the number of times you've had a full 24 oz. of water, but the wring is pretty challenging to manipulate (for me at least).
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bottle for my husband since I was buying a similar one in a set as well. We drink a lot of water during the day and this bottle helps us maintain this routine. The lid flips up with a push of a button. The lid stays out of the way when drinking from the spout. When the bottle is being transported the locking mechanism is easy to apply. On the side is a tracker to help you remember how many times you have filled up the bottle. This is hard to slide over, however this feature isn't really important to us. If you are debating this buy don't hesitate. Very happy with this purchase and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Clevenger

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but leaks often
customer_reviews.text: It has held well for last 2 years. The only drawback is the lid and sipping area is a little difficult to clean and the bottle leaks quite often while drinking or if you turn it upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Divij

customer_reviews.title: Don't drop it: lid won't latch ever again.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought three of these bottles, one blue, one purple, one gray. After knocking each of these bottles off the kitchen counter and or dining room table a few times, the lid did not latch ever again. The little metal lock worked fine, but the plastic/rubber latch never closed again, leaving the lid open at a 45-degree angle. It's not that the bottle itself isn't durable or easy to use or clean but the lid is a real problem. --David Uskovich
customer_reviews.author: J Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It is a great thermos for room temperature liquids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thermos for work. I made this purchase based off of several recommendations on websites and after reading multiple reviews on Amazon. Overall, the reviews were correct. It is a great thermos for room temperature liquids. Unfortunately, it sweats when ice is added to the mix... As long as you aren't looking for a thermos for cold liquids or if you don't mind the condensation that occurs, this is a perfect thermos.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Best water bottle ever!
customer_reviews.text: The lid does not leak - even tossed in a bag and carried around. It has a lock on the lid that keeps in from accidentally opening. Once I'm ready to use the ball, I just flip off the lock. The lid is still leak proof and pops open with the press of the release button. I can drink one handed and keep the bottle closed in between - with no fumbling with slides or screw tops. I did notice, however, that after about a year the lid loses some of its tension and doesn't "pop" all the way open when the release button on the cap is pressed - but that is after a YEAR of consistent use.
customer_reviews.author: andro

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent item. I regret not doing a little more research on this. This water bottle will not remain cold throughout the day (unless its in a cooler or refrigerator). I really hoped it would have the similar cooling system as a canteen. Overall, it is a sturdy product (I've dropped it several times and it hasn't cracked yet) and it doesn't give the liquid a strange taste.
customer_reviews.author: Isophormism

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to drink from and clean. Press an easy to find button on the front and the cover to the drink spout opens. Easy to work and doesn't leak. Has handle for carrying. Fits in my car drink holder. Small amount of condensation on outside when filled with cold drinks. For price, great product.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle. This was the second Thermos Intak bottle I've owned, was buying it as a second. I've had the first one for over two years, and its still going strong (just getting a little grimy since I've put iced tea in it a lot). Absolutely no breakage. There is a little ring around the top to count how much water you drink--at first I didn't use it but lately trying to drink more water it has been helpful. Great bottle, easy to open with one hand. I use it at the gym, while driving, for work, everything. Bought it for around $11 here on Amazon--it's similarly priced in stores. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep coming back for this
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle. I tried many different type/brand but I keep coming back to this. I like the easy and simple to drink and clean. This bottle lasts long time to me (1 year) until I lost it somewhere (3 times already)
customer_reviews.author: du@nh

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't leak!
customer_reviews.text: The best water bottle you can buy. Doesn't leak and last forever. Eventually you might drop it really hard and someone posted in the reviews how to buy replacement lids. Once in a while I'll buy a different kind if water bottle and always regret it. The best thing about these is that they don't leak at all.
customer_reviews.author: j_and_goddess

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat Fragile.. Do Not Drop.
customer_reviews.text: Mine only lasted for a few months until it was accidentally knocked off the kitchen counter. Once that happened, a piece chipped and it wouldn't snap shut anymore. This caused it to start leaking when tilted sideways. It would keep leaking even when I used the metal latch to close the lid. Otherwise, Meh, it's alright. This is a decent product, and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Mimilia

customer_reviews.title: OK water bottle.  Not great.
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay water bottle - I still don't think it's worth the $14 price tag, but it holds water well, doesn't leak, and seems to withstand dropping well. Fits in every water-bottle pouch on every bag I have without issue. Not worth the $14 investment, but if you want a water bottle and want to pay needlessly for it, this would be okay. Update, 9/15: A couple of months ago, I said it seems to withstand dropping well. I was wrong. Use caution with this bottle - it's definitely not the rough and tumble type. Took a trip to the garbage yesterday when a drop shattered it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Doane

customer_reviews.title: Flip cap is not durable enough for daily use over a year
customer_reviews.text: I love it while the lid's not broken. The flip lid keeps the mouth clean and it's never leaked even without the metal bail engaged on the cap. I've bought three but have had to replace the lids on two of them. I will not be buying additional replacements and will instead go back to the Nalgene On-the-Go or On-the-Fly bottles which seem to have more durable lids for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Jayhawk94

customer_reviews.title: Nice, easy-to-clean bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love this bottle...I got two! I had the Nalgene with the straws, but the gross black stuff that collected in the straw and the base was just too yucky to deal with (bleach wouldn't even do the job), so I went with this bottle instead. Much easier to clean, much more sanitary, and sleeker. If I have to use plastic, this is the bottle I want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Still useful after 4 months of active use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased four of these water bottles at the beginning of soccer season. They've done a great job of holding the water without spilling. They do sweat and they have no thermal capability so it's just like using any plastic cup or bottle. I read the reviews about the clear parts and have hand-washed these everytime with no loss of the clear, rubber parts. After four months of use and a busy soccer season, only one became unusable after the metal clasp came off the lid. All of them have developed a faded and scratched look to them. We did put them to use and they were thrown in bags and on soccer fields. All in all a good water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: sale_aholic

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for baseball. Its been dropped and thrown and it still works. The little seal in the top did fall into the bottle a couple of times though.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super durable
customer_reviews.text: I've had this now for about five years and it's been dropped, bumped, and knocked all around. The auto release mechanism for the lid still works, no leaking, and the easy carry handle is still in place.
customer_reviews.author: sunshinelo

customer_reviews.title: It holds that water!
customer_reviews.text: Um, it's a water bottle. It works to hold water. You can drink the water thru the valve. I guess that's everything you need to know.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N Perry

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality lid - breaks VERY easily
customer_reviews.text: The flask itself is great. Very strong. However, we've been through three of these now where the locking mechanism on the lid has broken on the first, not-particularly-high drop. It's such a lovely drink bottle otherwise but the fragility of the lid is just not good enough. You can buy spare lids but they're very expensive with postage. And they're also difficult to source. What a shame Thermos!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Tell your friends!
customer_reviews.text: If you're trying to up your water intake and don't wanna carry around a huge jug with silly motivational quotes all over it THIS IS FOR YOU! It's a standard size bottle with measurements and a counter. Simple! 3 bottles = 1/2 gallon 6 bottles = 1 gallon I love it! I haven't been able to take in a whole gallon in a day but I'm working towards it and it's super easy to keep track!
customer_reviews.author: A. McClelland

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite
customer_reviews.text: We have 8 of these bottles and I'm not sure it is enough since they are always disappearing into soccer bags, bike drink holders and cars. They aren't insulated but they hold up better than the insulated bottles in the dishwasher which is key at our house and we love that the drinking area is closed off from the world.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bottle But Lid Breaks with 1 Fall
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle. But I’ve bought two so far and both caps which keep the lid closed with one click have broken and don’t work anymore after just one fall on the ground. You can still manually close it with a piece of metal you can lift and slam shut, but that’s a big hassle to do every time when you can otherwise just conveniently shut the cap. It’s really, really a shame since otherwise this is a great bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Lin Guistic

customer_reviews.title: Good bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love this bottle. My only problem is if it falls, the closing device usylually breaks, no way to fix it. Still buying same bottle since it is the best I found after trying few. It is easely cleaned and not getting mold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased one of these locally about a year ago. It was a different shade of purple. It mysteriously disappeared from my office at work. When I found it on Amazon, I just assumed it was the same bottle but the picture was not true to the color I had. When it arrived, I was very pleased. It was a true dark purple, much nicer than the one I had. I have found that I drink much more water per day when I use this bottle compared to just drinking the water from the packaged bottles. I really can't explain it. Since most of us do not drink enough water, this is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Outta Control

customer_reviews.title: Best water bottle ever made!
customer_reviews.text: Best water bottle ever. I have had three of these now. One I lost after two years. Another I dropped while I had the top open and the latch broke. When I went back to the store to buy my third they had updated the model and it didn't look as secure on this one. So off to Amazon and thankfully they still carried it. Over 5 years of daily use and I have never had a leak. Just make sure to pull out and clean the rubber gasket every couple of week and you should never have any issue.
customer_reviews.author: DCCorgi

product_meta.title: Thermos Nissan Intak Hydration Water Bottle with Meter, Blue
product_meta.description: Color:Dark BlueThermos Intak Hydration Bottle is made from BPA free, impact- resistant, dishwasher durable Eastman Tritan copolyester. It has a locking leak-proof lid with one-hand push button operation. Theres a flip up loop for easy carrying; ergonomic design for comfortable usage. Monitor your intake with the rotating intake meter- perfect if you are trying to get those 8 glasses of water in everyday. Ideal for water, iced tea, juices and sports drinks: 24-ounce capacity.
feature_bullets: Made from BPA-free, impact resistant and dishwasher durable Eastman Tritan copolyester
Easy opening hygienic push button sipper lid with locking ring
Rotating meter lets you monitor your daily water consumption
One handed push button lid operation; Flip up carrying loop
Ergonomic design is comfortable to grip; 24 ounce capacity

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars4,525 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
